programme.sub-title: Juan Diego Florez, Sinfonía por el Perú: Opera and Zarzuela arias
programme.desc: Sinfonía por el Perú, Ana María Patiño-Osorio (conductor) Juan Diego Florez (tenor) Vincenzo Bellini Norma | Overture I Capuleti e i Montecchi | O, di Capellio... È serbata a questo acciaro... Lamo tanto e mè sì cara Gaetano Donizetti Roberto Devereux | Ed ancor la tremenda porta… Come uno spirito angelico… Bagnato il sen di lagrime Il Duca dAlba | Inosservato penetrava... Angelo casto e bel Giuseppe Verdi La Forza del destino | Overture Jerusalem | Je veux encore entendre ta voix Charles Gounod Romeo et Juliette | Act II: Entracte Romeo et Juliette | Lamour, lamour... Ah, lève-toi soleil ! Jacques Offenbach Orphee aux enfers | Can-Can La Belle Helène | Au mont Ida Ruperto Chapí La Revoltosa | Preludio Jose Serrano La Alegria del batallon | El Mismo rey del moro Pablo Luna La Pícara molinera | Paxarín tú que vuelas Reveriano Soutullo, Juan Vert El ultimo romantico | Bella enamorada Geronimo Gimenez La boda de Luis Alonso | Intermedio Agustin Lara Granada Paris, Philharmonie, 30 September 2024

programme.title: Stan Getz
programme.desc: Regarded as the greatest instrumental soloist of all-time, Stanley Gayetzky, famously known as Stan Getz emerged as one of the most significant musical forces in the world of jazz post World War II. With his distinctively warm and lyrical tone, Getz is fondly dubbed as "The Sound" because of his singularity and musical innovations. His commitment to music is evident from his long body of work that includes over 300 pieces of musical compositions. Ranked among Americas top tenor saxophone players, Getz was a gifted saxophonist who could play just about anything on it, a quality that put him on top of the polls. He is accredited for playing some of the best jazz with some of the best jazzmen in the country. However, his personal life was a rollercoaster ride — tumultuous and loused up by abjection, alcohol, addiction and furious flare-ups.

programme.title: Duo Laura Perrudin and Thibault Florent - Jazz à la peniche Maison Nougaro
programme.desc: Duo Laura Perrudin | Thibault Florent Laura Perrudin (Prepared chromatic harp, objects and vocal) Thibault Florent (12 strings, bandjo, tap, objects and vocal) Play list Musical show Recorded at the Maison Nougaro barge from January 25 to January 31st, 2021 TV Director, Patrick Lauze

programme.title: Milt Jackson and Ray Brown Quartet - Lugano Jazz Estival
programme.desc: Milt Jackson / Ray Brown 4tet Jazz Estival Milt Jackson (vibraphone) Stanley Turrentine (saxophone) Ray Brown (doublebass) Cedar Walton (piano) Mickey Roher (drums) Recorded in 1986, Lugano, Swiss Tv director, Sandro Pedrazzetti

programme.title: Suites for a suffering world - Tanja Tetzlaff
programme.desc: Suites for a suffering world Tanja Tetzlaff (cello) Johann Sebastian Bach 1685 - 1750 Cello Suite No.4 in E-flat major, BWV 1010 Cello Suite No.5 in C minor, BWV 1011 Thorsten Encke 1966 - Cracks, Clouds The German cellist Tanja Tetzlaff performs J.S. Bachs Cello Suites Nos. 4 and 5 amid natural surroundings devastated by climate change. Beauty confronts its own destruction. Do we really want to watch without lifting a finger? Melting glaciers, desertified landscapes, flooded communities: climate change is having an alarming impact even in Europe. What are we humans doing to this wonderful planet? Aghast at the depredation and destruction of our unique ecosystems, the renowned German cellist Tanja Tetzlaff wants to ask Nature for forgiveness. She travels with her instrument to places in Europe where climate change has already become reality and visibly dealt severe wounds. Surrounded by sometimes bizarre scenery, she performs Johann Sebastian Bachs Cello Suites Nos. 4 and 5, contrasting them with works specially composed for her by Thorsten Encke. She levels accusations, stokes resistance, and touches us with her virtuoso playing. The beauty of the music stands in sharp contrast to the often-dramatic images of damaged Nature, combatting the finality of destruction. A moving musical and visual plea for greater care and humility toward the beauty of our planet - at once ravishing and disturbing. Recorded at Aletsch Glacier (Switzerland), Cernon Forest (France), Harz Forest (Germany), Lac de Brenets (France/Switzerland), La Scène (Strasbourg/France), Rhone Glacier (Switzerland), Soulac-sur-Mer (France) Directed by Stephan Aube

programme.title: John Eliot Gardiner conducts Bach Mass in B minor

programme.title: Barenboim on Beethoven
programme.desc: Directed by Christopher Nupen 1970 was the 200th anniversary of Ludwig van Beethovens birth and, to mark the occasion, Daniel Barenboim and Christopher Nupen collaborated on a thirteen-part series about the man and his music. Close friends at the time, Barenboim as artist and Nupen as filmmaker, were on the cusp of long and illustrious careers in music. Much of the material they shot has never been broadcast and, until recently, the footage had lain dormant for half a century. Now the series has been resurrected in its original form. It was recorded when Daniel Barenboim was in his late twenties, full of talent, charisma and early authority. During the episodes, he talks and plays extracts at the piano, illustrating the defining characteristics of Beethovens compositions and sharing his personal insight into the composers mindset. Throughout, he addresses the camera directly as presenter, adding to the intensity of the narrative. For orchestral pieces, he conducts the New Philharmonia Orchestra or plays at the piano with Sir Adrian Boult taking the conductors baton. "Barenboim On Beethoven" is a musical journey charting Beethovens progression in the context of his contemporaries such as Mozart and Haydn. Over twenty key compositions are performed and dissected, making this a unique body of work.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: MTV Floribama Shore
programme.desc: Meet eight young and beautiful people - Jeremiah Buoni, Nilsa Prowant, Gus Smyrnios, Kortni Gilson, Codi Butts, Aimee Hall, Kirk Medas and Candace Rice, who relocate to Panama City Beach, the hottest beach town on the Gulf Coast for the summer. There, they all live together and have outrageous antics, spending their time drinking, partying, working, mingling and bonding with each other, in this reality series that is a successor to the well-known Jersey Shore.

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.sub-title: My Past Is Whooping My Ass
programme.desc: The Teen Moms are thrown into a new world of parenting adolescents while juggling their own relationships and making shocking personal discoveries. Mackenzie McKee returns as a series regular and Jenelle Evans makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.sub-title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.sub-title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act. With the help of a relationship expert and a private investigator, Tami will uncover the shocking truths and get the receipts to expose the cheats. Once the investigation is complete, the suspicious lover can choose to team up with their partners other lover or take them both down in an undercover ambush. In a life-altering confrontation, Tamis tough love approach will help the heartbroken find the answers they need to make the ultimate decision - move forward together or end their relationship for good. Will Tamis exposure bring these lovers closure?

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Johnny slipped into Ariels DMs over a year ago and now theyre engaged! Ariel plays stepmother to Johnnys son, but Johnny wont let her meet the mother of his child and is hiding her from virtually every aspect of his life!

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.desc: This thirty-fifth season of the MTV reality competition series The Challenge sees members The Real World, Are You the One?, Big Brother, Celebrity Big Brother UK, The Amazing Race, Survivor, Geordie Shore, Ex on the Beach, Shipwrecked and Survival of the Fittest go head-to-head in a bid to secure the 1 million dollar prize. The competitors participate in daily challenges and can be nominated to take part in the elimination round where they battle against another adversary to avoid being sent home. The remaining combatants endure a harrowing final challenge which pushes them to the limits of their strength and determination.

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Monika seeks Tamis help to investigate if her gym manager husband has been sweating it out in the gym or sweating another woman.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: MTV Floribama Shore
programme.desc: Meet eight young and beautiful people - Jeremiah Buoni, Nilsa Prowant, Gus Smyrnios, Kortni Gilson, Codi Butts, Aimee Hall, Kirk Medas and Candace Rice, who relocate to Panama City Beach, the hottest beach town on the Gulf Coast for the summer. There, they all live together and have outrageous antics, spending their time drinking, partying, working, mingling and bonding with each other, in this reality series that is a successor to the well-known Jersey Shore.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Vanishing Kings
programme.sub-title: Vanishing Kings: Desert Lions of Namib

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. One of the main driving forces in animal behaviour is the desire to procreate and ensure the continuity of the species and this is evident in the battles that males participate in for the right to mate with females. However, parenting skills can vary enormously with some animals being prepared to give up their own lives for their offspring while others are revealed to pose the greatest threat. The show also examines how the animals impact on the landscape by building paths and constructing homes.

programme.title: Vanishing Kings
programme.sub-title: Vanishing Kings: Desert Lions of Namib

programme.title: Lion Brothers
programme.desc: With his brothers help, Mtima faces the trials of life and learns the true meaning of leadership to become the king he always dreamed hed be.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in New Mexico
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and The Snuggly
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Journey across Africa exploring the continents most iconic and deadliest predators. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: When Predators Attack
programme.desc: This docuseries detais what happens when predators come face to face with their prey and humans and reveals the reasons why dangerous encounters take place and the best way for people to avoid them or to make a quick escape if necessary. Each one hour long episode focuses on a specifice animal including formidable killer snakes that use deadly venom or constriction to defeat their opponent; black bears, grizzlies, and giant polar bears who are increasingly encroaching into human territory because of climate change and are confronting more humans; and the most ancient of predators, the crocodile.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies

The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: Lions. A look at the strategies adopted by a pride of South African lions as they hunt zebras, impalas and giraffes in the Singita Game Reserve.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Lion Brothers
programme.desc: With his brothers help, Mtima faces the trials of life and learns the true meaning of leadership to become the king he always dreamed hed be.

programme.title: Attack of the Big Cats
programme.desc: There are nearly 40 different species of cats running around out there, but only four make it into the big cat club. The lion, tiger, leopard and jaguar. And theyre armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. Its not always all about size, you know.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Journey across Africa exploring the continents most iconic and deadliest predators. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.sub-title: All for One, and One for Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest predators in the animal kingdom owe their success to the fact that they dont kill alone. Worlds Deadliest: Packs and Swarms takes a deep dive into the world of group predation with a look at twelve different species that use teamwork to hunt more effectively than they otherwise would be able to alone.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Among animals, battles are often a zero-sum game. In just about every struggle, theres a winner and a loser, and the stakes are often life or death. The motives for combat are varied, but they usually boil down to this: food, territory, and sex. Worlds Deadliest: Battles looks at the epic struggles that ensue when predators seek to make a meal out of their prey…

programme.title: Snakes in the City
programme.desc: Catching the worlds deadliest snakes is no problem for Simon Keys and his partner Siouxsie Gillett, who round up Durbans ever-growing population of street snakes. With the summer heat enticing the snakes into the city, its the duos job to safely catch the slithering creatures and release them safely back into the wild. Entering homes, offices and even factories, the reclusive reptiles seek to find shelter in places you wouldnt think likely. From black mambas to cobras, Simon and Siouxsie have their work cut out as they race to help the residents of Durban stay safe from a potentially lethal snakebite.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: India, one of the oldest and culturally rich countries on the planet. Its Its millions of square miles contain six distinct climate zones and sustain nearly a billion people . Living within its arid deserts, lush jungles, and rugged mountains are scores of dangerous species. Among this myriad is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the forests of the Sunderbans, Indias deadly dozen creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met it first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Indias Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: North America is home to an array of wild creatures…creatures that have roamed the continent for millennia. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the painted deserts to the coastal waterways, to the dense forests, to our own back yards…they creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when we reach the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. For this superlative denizen of the natural world, we not only go in depth to examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but we also hear from someone whos met it first hand, and lived to tell the story. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are North Americas Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

With the summer heat enticing the snakes into the city, its the duos job to safely catch the slithering creatures and release them safely back into the wild. Entering homes, offices and even factories, the reclusive reptiles seek to find shelter in places you wouldnt think likely. From black mambas to cobras, Simon and Siouxsie have their work cut out as they race to help the residents of Durban stay safe from a potentially lethal snakebite.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: India, one of the oldest and culturally rich countries on the planet. Its Its millions of square miles contain six distinct climate zones and sustain nearly a billion people . Living within its arid deserts, lush jungles, and rugged mountains are scores of dangerous species. Among this myriad is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the forests of the Sunderbans, Indias deadly dozen creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met it first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Indias Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: North America is home to an array of wild creatures…creatures that have roamed the continent for millennia. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the painted deserts to the coastal waterways, to the dense forests, to our own back yards…they creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when we reach the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. For this superlative denizen of the natural world, we not only go in depth to examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but we also hear from someone whos met it first hand, and lived to tell the story. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are North Americas Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. programme.title: Kerose varjatud saladused
programme.desc: Egeuse mere sudames korraldatakse uurimisretk. Arheoloogide ruhm avastab võib-olla et maailma vanima veealuse varjupaiga.

programme.title: Saladuslikud saared
programme.desc: Uuritakse Venemaa huljatud sõjavaebaasi kulma sõja paevilt. Colombia ranniku lahedal leitakse saarelt lagunev kuninglik palee. Jaapani Yonaguni saare juurest avastatakse mere põhjast kivistruktuur. Itaalias leitakse Stromboli vulkaanisaarelt tõendeid sealse keeruka ajaloo kohta.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: HSI agendid uurivad JFK lennujaamas kahtlast pagasikaitlejat ning paljastavad rahvusvahelise kriminaalse ruhmituse, mis kasutab Ameerikasse kokaiini vedamiseks lennujaama tootajaid. Tanu uuele infole toimuvad kogu riigis vahistamised ja kauba konfiskeerimine, uks ka JFK terminali lahedal. MIA tolli- ja piirivalveteenistus kahtlustab, et reisija on peitnud kokaiini oma kingadesse, ning Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas võetakse vahele võltsitud esemete laadung, mille vaartus on hinnanguliselt 500 000 dollarit.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: MIA tolli- ja piirivalveteenistus võtab sihikule reisija, kes kaib tihti Colombias, ning teda kusitledes tekib kahtlus, et mees võib narkootikume smugeldada. Ametnikud otsivad narkolasti ja uritavad pusida kartellist sammuke eespool. HSI agendid viivad JFK lennujaama postiruumist leitud ecstasy Wall Streetile ning Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas kusitletakse kaht reisijat nende kulastuse teemal. Üht neist kummitab siiani kunagine narkotarbimine.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Tavareisil Berliinist teel olev Crossairi lend 3597 laheneb Zurichile. See on uks paeva viimaseid planeeritud maandumisi. Aga mõni minut enne maandumist ei suuda piloodid enam lennurada leida.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui kahe Boeing 737 MAX 8 lennukiga juhtub vaid viie kuu jooksul surmaga lõppenud õnnetus, on kogu MAX 8 lennukipark sõidust kõrvaldatud, kuni uurijad paljastavad mõlema õnnetuse põhjuse.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Keset aikesetorme ja vihmavalinguid asub Martinairi lend 495 lõpplahenemisele Portugali Faro lennujaamale. Kuid vaid hetked enne maandumist laheb midagi valesti ja DC-10 prantsatab vastu lennurada, puruneb ja libiseb lennurajalt maha. Uskumatul kombel jaavad enamik reisijaid ja meeskond ellu. Kuid kui uurijad asuvad vrakist saadud tõendusmaterjale analuusima, muutub juhtunu veelgi mustilisemaks.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: "Lollid ja teadus", 7. hooaeg. Dallas Campbell juhib saadet, mis uhendab tõsise teaduse televaatajate salvestatud hullumeelsete ja vaatemanguliste klippidega. Selles osas uurime teaduslikult ebaõnnestunud katseid ATV-ga 360 kraadist pooret teha, jõekarestikel sõita ja võimlemispalliga treenida.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: "Lollid ja teadus", 7. hooaeg. Dallas Campbell juhib saadet, mis uhendab tõsise teaduse televaatajate salvestatud hullumeelsete ja vaatemanguliste klippidega. Selles kosmoseteemalises osas soostame kosmosesse ja uurime kulgetõmbejõude, ulekoormust, elamiskõlblikke piirkondi ja kokkupõrkeid.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: On avastatud palju uusi tõendeid tsivilisatsioonidest, mis on nuudseks sajandeid merepõhjas olnud, alates salaparastest veealustest puramiididest Jaapani rannikul ning lõpetades legendaarse Atlantisega. Kas tegemist on tõeliste antiiksete paikadega või pelgalt geoloogiliste juhustega? Kasutame tipptasemel arvutigraafikat ning raagime maailma juhtivate merearheoloogidega, et avastada, mis merepõhjas tegelikult toimub.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Michigani jarve kuivendamine toob paevavalgele Chicago varjatud ajaloo. Uusima sonartehnikaga paljastame 300 inimese surmaga lõppenud katastroofi, lahendame traagilise jõulumõistatuse, uurime Teisest maailmasõjast parit murdelist merevae treeningprogrammi ja avastame inseneriteaduse ime, mis takistab maailma kõige kiiremini kasvava linna elanikke surnuks lambumast. Chicago hammastava loo keskmes on ambitsioonikus ja risk, ainult et vahel lõpeb see katastroofiga.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Kaks vesilennukit, mille pardal on turistid, põrkavad Alaska vapustava kose kohal kokku. Üks puruneb kokkupõrkel, teine kukub peaaegu tervena vette. Ellujaanud piloot tunnistab, et kokkupõrge juhtus ilma igasuguse hoiatuseta. Vrakist selgub kiiresti, kuidas lennukid kokku põrkasid, aga põhjuse selgitamiseks tuleb kasutada 3D-tehnoloogiat.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 4. novembril 2010, vahetult parast Singapuri Changi lennujaamast õhkutõusmist, tekkis Qantase lennul 32 mootoririke, mis kahjustas tõsiselt lennukit. Meeskond veetis õhus kaks pingelist tundi enne edukat hadamaandumist, mis paastis kõik pardal viibijad. Selles episoodis jagab kapten Richard de Crespigny oma ulevaadet sellest, kuidas ta kangelaslikult toime tuli sellega, mis oleks võinud olla kindel katastroof.

programme.title: Katastroofi Lahkamine
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. Why did Fukushimas nuclear plant meltdown and explode after a massive earthquake? How did a 200ft tall tower crane collapse onto the Manhattan streets? Why did the USS Forrestal, Americas flagship aircraft carrier, explode killing 134 crew?

programme.title: Katastroofi Lahkamine
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Deepwater Horizon explode causing the worst manmade oil spill in history? Why did the Air France Concorde crash barely a minute after take off? How did so many people die in an Austrian funicular trip up the inside of a mountain at Kaprun?

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Valk on tabanud saabuvat rahvusvahelist lendu. Insenerid hindavad kahjustusi, kuid reisijad muutuvad uha karsitumaks. Kõva tuul toob kaasa lennuradade sulgemise, mis muudab lennuplaanid pingeliseks. Saabub veel uks lennuk, mille lastist lekib potentsiaalselt ohtlik vedelik. Kolm maapealse meeskonna liiget, kes sellega kokku puutusid, pannakse karantiini, kuni tuletõrjujad saavad vedeliku tuvastada.

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Kuna Sydney lennujaam tootab murapiirangute tõttu vaid ajavahemikus 06.00-23.00, on seal pinge peal, et korraldada paevas 900 lennuki liikumist. Toodejuhataja George seisab silmitsi kahtlase pakiga ja algajal Melil on tunni aja jooksul akitselt kaks meditsiinilist hadaolukorda. Lisaks on kaubakaitlusmeeskonnal probleem pungil tais kaubakabiini laadimisega.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Vaga suur osa meie majandusest toetub kaubaveole. Terve maailma toostusharud sõltuvad tootlikkuse suurendamiseks kaubalennukitest, avamerelaevadest ja elektrirongidest. Asjatundjad uurivad, kuidas kolossaalseid kaubamasinaid kavandatakse vedama tohututes kogustes kaupa kiiresti ja tõhusalt.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 12. augustil 1985 pidi Japan Airlines 123 viima 524 reisijat Tokyost Osakasse. Vaid 12 minutit parast lennu algust tekkis aga Boeingis 747 saatuslik dekompressioon, mis rebis ara suurema osa sabaosast. Kuna hudraulika oli taielikult kadunud, ei suutnud meeskond lennukit juhtida. Kogenud piloodid puuavad lennusimulaatorite abil valtida lennuõnnetust, milles hukkus 520 inimest.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 2018. aasta oktoobris juhtus esimene saatuslik 737 MAX lennutragoodia, milles hukkusid kõik pardal olnud 189 inimest. Lion Airi lend 610 oli õhus vaid 13 minutit, enne kui kaotas kontrolli ja kukkus merre. Varsti parast seda, 2019. aasta martsis, kukkus 6 minutit parast õhkutõusu alla teine Etioopiast valjuv 737 MAX, tappes kõik inimesed pardal. Uurijad jagavad, kuidas neid tragoodiaid oleks saanud ara hoida.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 17. jaanuaril 2008 lahenes British Airwaysi lend 38 Londoni Heathrow lennujaamale, kui see vahetult enne lennurada alla kukkus. Pekingist (Hiina) saabunud rahulik reisilend muutus peaaegu saatuslikuks, kui mõlema mootori võimsuse puudumise tagajarjel kukkus Boeing 777 alla. Meeskonna ja kapten Peter Burkilli kiire mõtlemine hoidis ara surmaga lõppeva õnnetuse ja paastis kõik 152 inimest pardal.

programme.title: Superautode tuunimine
programme.desc: Kogenud mehhaanikud Shane ja Dan pistavad rinda senistest keerukama ulesandega. Neil tuleb Audi RB muuta Gymkhana Gridi võistlusautoks.

programme.title: Superautode tuunimine
programme.desc: Shane Lunch ja Dan Baruffo saavad elu võimaluse. DeLorean Motor Company omanik soovib, et nad teeksid paris uue auto.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Tuumaenergia on vaatamata vastuolulisele mainele tehnoloogia arengule uskumatul viisil vagagi kasulik. Kriminalistika- ja kosmosemissioonisusteemide insenerid selgitavad, kuidas tuumaenergia toidab raadioisotoopseid generaatoreid ja nendega seotud susteeme, mis on olulised karmides tingimustes toimuvate kosmoselaevade, satelliitide, kosmosesondide ja mehitamata kaugoperatsioonide jaoks.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Vaga suur osa meie majandusest toetub kaubaveole. Terve maailma toostusharud sõltuvad tootlikkuse suurendamiseks kaubalennukitest, avamerelaevadest ja elektrirongidest. Asjatundjad uurivad, kuidas kolossaalseid kaubamasinaid kavandatakse vedama tohututes kogustes kaupa kiiresti ja tõhusalt.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: In this programme, we examine the science behind some of the worlds most impressive, technologically advanced machines. What big ideas drove their evolution? How do they actually work? What sets each machine apart? Follow along for all the fascinating stories as we reveal the best-kept mechanical secrets that not only made these extraordinary machines work, but also changed the world in a big way.

programme.title: Megaprojektid
programme.desc: Vaatleme Real Madridi kuulsa staadioni, meeskonna fannide tõelise templi Santiago Bernabeu tipptasemel renoveerimistoid. Igavale betoonehitisele futuristliku metallfassaadi, sissetõmmatava katuse, 360º-videotabloo ja revolutsioonilise maa-aluse valjakususteemi paigaldamine ajal, kui seal toimuvad ka mangud, uletab inseneriteaduse piirid.

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Valk on tabanud saabuvat rahvusvahelist lendu. Insenerid hindavad kahjustusi, kuid reisijad muutuvad uha karsitumaks. programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: JFK lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud peatavad Trinidadist saabunud reisija, kelle pagasis on konservid troopiliste puuviljadega. Konservid sisaldavad puuviljade asemel aga valget pulbrit. Tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud leiavad Miami postikeskusest pudelikesed kahtlase vedelikuga. Selgub, et tegemist on GBL-iga, ohtliku ainega, mida vagistajad kasutavad oma ohvri uimastamiseks. Smugeldaja tabamiseks toimetatakse saadetis HSI jarelevalve all saajateni. Los Angelese rahvusvahelise lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud kuulavad ule naissoost reisijaid, kes võivad olla seksikaubanduse ja abielupettuse ohvrid.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: JFK lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud otsivad labi Panamast Hong Kongi sõitva reisija, kel pole tood ega raha. Ametnikud kahtlustavad, et ta smugeldab narkootikume labi Ameerika Ühendriikide. Miami rahvusvahelise lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud leiavad Argentiinasse suunduva postisaadetise hulgast ebaseaduslikke relvaosi, mis kaivitab rahvusvahelise uurimise. HSI suundub nuud Buenos Airesisse, et aidata kohalikel ametivõimudel korraldada kahtlustatavatele relvakaubitsejatele uleriigiline haarang. Operatsiooni "Patagoonia ekspress" kaigus arestitakse suurim relvalaadung Argentiina ajaloos.

Uurijad jagavad, kuidas neid tragoodiaid oleks saanud ara hoida.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 17. jaanuaril 2008 lahenes British Airwaysi lend 38 Londoni Heathrow lennujaamale, kui see vahetult enne lennurada alla kukkus. Pekingist (Hiina) saabunud rahulik reisilend muutus peaaegu saatuslikuks, kui mõlema mootori võimsuse puudumise tagajarjel kukkus Boeing 777 alla. Meeskonna ja kapten Peter Burkilli kiire mõtlemine hoidis ara surmaga lõppeva õnnetuse ja paastis kõik 152 inimest pardal.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Michigani jarve kuivendamine toob paevavalgele Chicago varjatud ajaloo. Uusima sonartehnikaga paljastame 300 inimese surmaga lõppenud katastroofi, lahendame traagilise jõulumõistatuse, uurime Teisest maailmasõjast parit murdelist merevae treeningprogrammi ja avastame inseneriteaduse ime, mis takistab maailma kõige kiiremini kasvava linna elanikke surnuks lambumast. Chicago hammastava loo keskmes on ambitsioonikus ja risk, ainult et vahel lõpeb see katastroofiga.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Eelmise sajandi jooksul kerkis esile uus ookeanihiiglane. Merearheoloogid ja ajaloolased otsivad labi aegade merre vajunud suurimaid laevavrakke. Uued teaduslikud andmed uhendatakse ookeanide tuhjendamiseks tipptasemel arvutigraafikaga, et uurida maailma kõige hammastavamaid vrakke.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Kariibi mere vaiksetes vetes aset leidnud salaparane lennukihukk ning USA ja Mehhiko piiri aares asuvate salajaste tunnelite avastamine paljastab, kui kaugele olid nõus kartellid minema, et kindlustada narkootikumide jõudmine maailma linnadesse. Nad on nii maal kui merel justkui nahtamatud, ent nuud saate oma silmaga tunnistada, kuidas ja mis marsruute kasutades kartellid tootasid.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Naftatehnikat Nigeeriasse vedav Transairi kaubalennuk lendab Prantsuse Alpide kohal tugevas turbulentsis, kui seda raputab plahvatus, mis rebib mõlemad mootorid paremalt tiivalt kuljest. Puudes oma vigastatud Boeing 707-i kontrolli all hoida, samal ajal kui tulekahju lennukis aeglaselt võimust võtab, õnnestub meeskonnal sooritada surmatrotsiv maandumine. Edasi on uurijate ulesanne avastada pisike, kuid eluohtlik viga.

programme.title: Hispaania Piirikaitse
programme.desc: Suvehooaja lahenedes on Hispaania rannikuala merendusasutused kõrgendatud valmisolekus. Paevast paeva sõidavad Hispaania territooriumi suunas arvukad uimasteid vedavad paadid, sealhulgas vaikelaevad, mis ootavad avamerel, et neid tankida. Lisaks suureneb turismipaatide ja jetide arv, mis sunnib rannavalveametnikke silmitsi seisma paljude olukordadega, mis võivad lõppeda traagiliselt.

programme.title: Hispaania Piirikaitse
programme.desc: Almerías uritab patrullpaat rannikul kahte tuhja paati arestida parast seda, kui sõitjad on ebaseaduslikust reisist eemaldatud. Samal ajal ajavad nende kolleegid Cádizis ja Baleaari saartel taga uimastikaubitsejate parvi ja uurivad Huelva sadamas mootorite musta turgu.

programme.title: Lennujaama turvateenistus
programme.desc: Alguses on narkootikumivedajad ametnike suhtes tihtipeale trotslikud, kuid lõpu poole nad murduvad. Kolumbia ja Peruu lennujaamade turvakontrolli protesti- ja eitusjuhtumid. Õed, kes algul eitavad narkootikumide alla neelamist, kuid annavad alla siis, kui selgub, et uks neist on rase. Joobes mees, kes tunnistab kahtlase pagasi alles peale arreteerimist omaks. Noor arvatavasti vaimuhaige naine, kes vaidab, et on suutu. Õllesse peidetud vedelkokaiiniga reisiv noormees valetab algul, kuid hiljem murdub siiski.

programme.title: Lennujaama turvateenistus
programme.desc: Need kullerid on sagedased reisijad. Colombia ja Peruu lennujaama turvakontrollis teeskleb kokaiini vedav hispaanlane šokki. Dominikaani Vabariiki reisiv kokaiini vedav mees raagib ametnikele, et ta on olnud seal ka varem. Oma teisel reisil olev mees vaidab, et teda sunniti. Naine kasutab reisimiseks teise inimese passi. Indoneesia naine veab kokaiini ja erinevaid valuutasid. Vabakutseline kaubitseja hoopleb, et tal on infot 1000-kilose laadungi kohta.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: Miamis avastavad sisejulgeolekuagendid kalasaadetisse peidetud 37 kilo kokaiini, mis on vaart ligi kaks miljonit dollarit. Samal ajal nurjavad San Diego sisejulgeolekuagendid San Ysidro piiri juures mitu inimsmugeldamiskatset, millega on seotud kaheksa inimest kolmes sõidukis. Atlantas otsivad tolli-põllumajandusspetsialistid reisijad labi, et peatada keelatud toiduainetest tulenevate invasiivsete liikide levik.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: Algajad USA tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud avastavad El Pasos heroiini, amfetamiini ja 45 kg marihuaanat. Tolli- ja piirivalveameti põllumajandusspetsialistid ja nende koerad leiavad lillesaadetistest kahjureid ja konfiskeerivad pagasist keelatud esemed. Los Angelese sisejulgeoleku uurimisamet teeb vahistamise seoses ebaseaduslike relvaosade impordiga ja korraldab uimastite salajase ostu ja reidi.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Plahvatus rebib tuliuue DC-10 keresse augu. Uurijad markavad, et tegu on raske konstruktsiooniveaga ja soovitavad selle parandada. Kaks aastat hiljem toob analoogiline viga kaasa fataalsed tagajarjed. Miks ei hoitud seda õnnetust ara?

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Varahommikune lend Lexingtonist Kentuckysse lõpeb katastroofiga, kui kahe mootoriga lennuk kaldub maandumisrajalt valja.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: Sisejulgeoleku uurimisamet vahistab inimsmugeldajad parast veoautode jalgimist El Pasos, avastades New Mexicos ulerahvastatud ja mahajaetud salalaod. Miamis tegutsev USA tolli- ja piirivalveamet kontrollib lasti ja avastab metamfetamiini, mis on peidetud labimõeldud masinaosadesse. Detroitis, põhjapiiril, konfiskeerib tolli- ja piirivalveamet USAsse maismaa ja õhu kaudu siseneva ja valjuva deklareerimata valuuta.

programme.title: Lennujaama turvateenistus
programme.desc: Need kullerid on sagedased reisijad. Colombia ja Peruu lennujaama turvakontrollis teeskleb kokaiini vedav hispaanlane šokki. Miamis tegutsev USA tolli- ja piirivalveamet kontrollib lasti ja avastab metamfetamiini, mis on peidetud labimõeldud masinaosadesse. programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: JFK lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud kuulavad ule Peruust saabunud eakat naist. Ametnikud kahtlustavad, et naise pagasis olevatesse pudelitesse on kavalalt narkootikume peidetud. Miami rahvusvahelises lennujaamas korraldab HSI haarangu. Maalide laadungist leitakse kokaiini. Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas tekitavad omanikuta kohvrid kahtlust. Ametnike arvates sisaldavad need kohvrid salakaupa.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: Miami rahvusvahelise lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud võtavad sihikule reisija, kes on Colombiat tihti kulastanud. Parast kusitlemist kahtlustatakse, et ta on narkopakke alla neelanud. Ametnikud otsivad laadungi labi, et leida keelatud aineid ja pidada kartelliga sammu. JFK lennujaama HSI-agendid saadavad jarelevalve all Wall Streetile ecstasy-paki, mis avastati postisaadetise hulgast. Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas kuulatakse kahte reisijat ule, kellest uhe jaoks tuleb varasem uimastitarbimine teda kummitama.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Plahvatus rebib tuliuue DC-10 keresse augu. Uurijad markavad, et tegu on raske konstruktsiooniveaga ja soovitavad selle parandada. Kaks aastat hiljem toob analoogiline viga kaasa fataalsed tagajarjed. Miks ei hoitud seda õnnetust ara?

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine

Puudes oma vigastatud Boeing 707-i kontrolli all hoida, samal ajal kui tulekahju lennukis aeglaselt võimust võtab, õnnestub meeskonnal sooritada surmatrotsiv maandumine. Edasi on uurijate ulesanne avastada pisike, kuid eluohtlik viga.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Lucona sihiparane uppuda laskmine lõpeb poolte meeskonnaliikmete surmaga - see on sungemaid kuritegusid, mis kunagi avamerel aset leidnud. Vahepeal pageb suudistatu võimude eest, et suudimõistvat otsust valtida. Vraki leidmine oleks ainus viis tema suu tõestamiseks. Võidujooks on alanud - tuleb tuvastada maailma sugavaim kuriteopaik ja koguda tõestusmaterjali, enne kui suudlane suust igavesti puhtaks saab.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Laanemere põhjas võib lebada isegi sada tuhat laevavrakki, kuid neist kõige valjapaistvam on lahingulaev Mars, mis kadus rohkem kui 450 aastat tagasi oma teenistuse teisel paeval. Legendidest tuntud laev avastati hiljuti Rootsi lahe lahedal ja kohe oli selge, et tegelikkus ei jaa muutidele sugugi alla.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: William kulastab Raynat tool ja õpib, mida on vaja, et olla parim telereporter. Beebi magab vanemate voodis ja talle meeldib see nii vaga, et uritab seda pusivaks muuta.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: Beebi hai ja William kohtuvad võrratu rapistaari Sharki B-ga, kes lõi tantsuhulluse Vetika kõikumise. Kui Chuck juhi kalli mulli ule ookeani, siis hooletu merihobu voolu tahtsust.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington teeb pannkooke / Paddington mangib jalgpalli
programme.desc: Paddington paastab Pannkoogipaeva, kui pr. Lind teeb lumelauaga sõitmisel kaele haiget ja ei saa pannkooke teha. Jonathan õpetab Paddingtonil jalgpalli, aga Paddington loob palli hr. Curry aeda. Nad otsustavad selle ara tuua, ronides ule aia.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington ja võlutrikk / Paddington ja vaene hr. Curry
programme.desc: Hr. Gruber annab Paddingtonile võlutrikkide kasti, aga Paddington ei suuda trikke selgeks õppida, kuni ta õpib pidevalt harjutama. Hr. Curry on haige ja Paddington otsustab ta oma sibulasupiga terveks ravida.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.desc: Kutsad asuvad tegutsema, et ehitada observatooriumit, et aidata sõber Riveril langevast tahest agedat pilti teha. Parast kohtumist pargivahi Roseiga, jaavad kutsad loodusesse lõksu. Rubble ja meeskond peab ehituslahenduse leidma.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.desc: Esimese Ehituslahe raamatukogu ehitus on mesilaste parast raske. Selleks laheb vaja erilist ehituslahendust. Vanaisa Killustik õpetab Chargerile tantsuvõistluseks parimaid liigutusi. Aga kas veerev diskokera võtab neilt esimese koha?

programme.title: Hirvemeeskond
programme.desc: Bobbi pidas sir Steeli saravat ankrut aardeks. Ja siis sattus sir Steeli tarretiseullatus vette! Seikluse Alex viib Hirvemeeskonna ja kaksikud laagrisse, et otsida Sarasaare mustilist Graxi kilpkonna.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.desc: Paddington laheb uutele seiklustele. Naiteks mereaarde puhkusele ja kulla tuleb ka eriline kulaline Peruust.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington leiab tuvi / Paddington ja koduste toode nimekiri
programme.desc: Paddington ravib haiget lindu kelle nimi on Tuvikene, aga kas ta saab temast lahti oelda? Perekonnas on kõikidel kodused tood peale Paddingtoni. Et mitte valja jaada loob hr. Brown nimekirja, mida Paddington peab jalgima, aga Paddington võtab vale nimekirja.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington teeb pannkooke / Paddington mangib jalgpalli
programme.desc: Paddington paastab Pannkoogipaeva, kui pr. Lind teeb lumelauaga sõitmisel kaele haiget ja ei saa pannkooke teha. Jonathan õpetab Paddingtonil jalgpalli, aga Paddington loob palli hr. Curry aeda. Nad otsustavad selle ara tuua, ronides ule aia.

programme.desc: Hr. Gruber annab Paddingtonile võlutrikkide kasti, aga Paddington ei suuda trikke selgeks õppida, kuni ta õpib pidevalt harjutama. Hr. Curry on haige ja Paddington otsustab ta oma sibulasupiga terveks ravida.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: Beebi hai sukeldub Beebi hai, pere ja sõprade tobedustesse.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: Beebi hai sukeldub Beebi hai, ta pere ja sõprade soolasesse tobedusse.

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad
programme.desc: Kui suur trikk laheb halvasti, lendab Uljasson kontrollimatu õhupalliga minema! Leek, AJ ja Uljassoni abiline trikikass peavad paeva paastma!

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad
programme.desc: Tana teeb dinosaurus Leek koostood oma eelajaloolise sõbra Zegiga, et võistelda dinosauruse rallil! Kas nad suudavad teistest kiiremad olla ja dinosauruse rallit võita?

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad
programme.desc: Vaata Sir Leegi ja Sir AJ naasmist, kui nad asuvad eepilisele rannakule, et vabastada maagiline ukssarvik purunematust mullist!

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad
programme.desc: Taevamae ralli stardijoonel ahvardab Lomastaja sohk Leegi pealtvaatajaks jatta. Rallis osalemiseks vajab Leek Jõurehve!

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik _ Kapapatrull
programme.sub-title: Kutsud Paastavad Pingviinid / Kutsud Paastavad Delfiinikutsika
programme.desc: Keegi on Kapten Turboti paadilt kalu pihta pannud ja ta kutsub asja uurima Ryderi ja Kapa-Patrulli. Delfiinibeebi ujub kogemata madala veega ojja! Nuud peavad Ryder ja Kapa-Patrull ta lahte tagasi viima.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik _ Kapapatrull
programme.sub-title: Kutsud Paastavad Apollo / Kutsud Paastavad Jõehobud
programme.desc: Superkutsa Apollo tuleb Rubblei unenaos Seiklustelahte. Kutsad peavad oma superkangelase paastma. Raimundo tantsivad jõehobud varistavad, raputavad ja tõmbavad tsirkusetelgi pikali. Kapa-patrull paneb selle õigeks ajaks pusti tagasi.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik _ Kapapatrull
programme.sub-title: Kutsad paastavad suure karvase / Kutsad paastavad lendava kiisu
programme.desc: Kutsad peavad suure ahvi oma autole meelitama, et ta tagasi džunglisse viia.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.sub-title: Meeskond ehitab võimla / Meeskond korraldab ehitusetenduse
programme.desc: Treener Karima palub, et Rubble ja meeskond ehitaks aeroobikaetteasteks võimla. Kui poom on Lilyle liiga kõrge, siis kutsad peavad paeva paastma. Randav etendus ei jõua Ehituslahte, seega Rubble ja meeskond otsustab oma etenduse luua.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.desc: Chargeril on probleem. Tal on magamiseks liiga palju energiat. Veab tal, et Rubble ja meeskonnal on alati ehituslahendus. Rubble ja kutsad ehitavad Mixile, Mootorile, Lucasele ja Lilyle lahedaima Super oravakeerise mangukohtingu eales.

programme.title: Hamsterdalei hamstrid
programme.desc: Hamstrite tiim kaib vapratel kuninglikel missioonidel, et kaitsta oma kaheksa-aastast omanikku Harryt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ja Saabas aitavad Saapa hadast valja, et ta piknikule jõuaks Dora ja Saabas aitavad Bateol jõuda pesapallimangule.

programme.title: Vaikse koka sõu
programme.desc: Henry osaleb teorallil! Aga Henry poole ralli puuviljasnakkide tegemine võtab liiga kaua aega. Kui Kokk saab teada, et Ruby on imeline ooperilaulja, siis ta uritab kupsetada õrna ooperikooki. Olly ehitab larmakalt Kannukontserdi lava.

programme.title: Hirvemeeskond
programme.desc: Lola on mures, et ta õhudemonstratsioon pole piisavalt muljet avaldav, aga Sir Steel liitub ja see laheb vaga valesti! Kui Sir Steeli koera Muffini pall kaob kanalisatsiooni, peab Bobbi pimeduse hirmule vastu astuma.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Kui lemmiksaurus kaotab oma saba, siis George kulastab hr Rebast, et uut leida.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Preili Janese rong laks katki, seega vanaisa laenab enda mangurongi, Trudyt.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Lastehoius on lemmikloomavõistlus ja kõik võtsid oma loomad kaasa. Dr Hamster on kohtunik, aga raske on valida parimat looma...

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa pere jaab nõbu Chloe juurde. Oli pikk paev ja kõik on vasinud, aga vaike Alexander ajab kõiki oma nutmisega ules.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington teeb pannkooke / Paddington mangib jalgpalli

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks

(Subtitled)

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang learns that he must go to the Fire Nation temple during the winter solstice if he wishes to speak with Avatar Roku to see what he must do. However, with Prince Zuko on his trail while he heads straight into the heart of the nation who wants him captured, he realizes that this isnt going to be an easy task. Will Aang be able to talk to Avatar Roku before Zuko finds him?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: After Katara attempts to teach Aang waterbending, she is desperate to improve her abilities. When Katara inadvertently stumbles across a waterbending scroll that can help improve her ability while Aang is looking at a pirates store, she decides to steal it after she realizes that she couldnt hope to afford it; but will she be capable of stealing from the pirates without causing herself and her friends trouble?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation. However, when a charismatic young man and his band of rebels attack the Fire Nations camp and rescue them, the gang learns that the rebels are trying to resist the Fire Nations motives to expand their territory. Katara and Aang really enjoy their time with the band of rebels, but Sokka soon discovers that they arent as noble as meets the eye

programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee: The Space Agency intends to send one of the chimps to the moon. In the opinion of certain flightless waterfowl, this important mission would be much better served by sending a flightless waterfowl instead. Private proves to be best suited for the trip (believe it or not) and with the help of a clever monkey suit disguise, he ends up on the moon.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: When Aang and friends come to the rim of a giant canyon, they are asked to help guide two groups of refugees across. Aang quickly learns that this will be no easy task - the two tribes have been fighting for 100 years, not to mention the vicious wildlife living on the canyon floor.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang, Katara and Sokka have run out of money. Katara suggests Sokka get a job, and coincidentally, they meet a fisherman who is looking for someone to help him out with his fishing. But when the fisherman recognizes Aang as the Avatar, he blames Aangs absence for all of the troubles of the last 100 years, and Aang runs away on his glider. Katara follows on Appa, and when she finds him, Aang begins to reveal life before he was frozen in the iceberg. Meanwhile, Prince Zuko and Lieutenant Jee get into a fight, but Iroh breaks it up. Soon thereafter, the Lieutenant and the rest of the crew gain a newfound respect for their leader after learning of his past

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured. Meanwhile, Zhao has been promoted to Admiral and he is using the Fire Nations best men to capture Aang, and he eventually succeeds. All hope seems lost for Aang and his friends, but there may just be a glimmer of hope when a strange blue spirit masked figure comes to Aangs rescue, but who could it possibly be?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar

programme.title: Avatar

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang feels neglected as Katara and Sokka reunite with Bato, an old friend of their fathers from the South Pole. They begin to reminisce on their times in the past while they wait for a message to arrive from their father; in which Aang believes Katara and Sokka will abandon him and go out to find their father should the message arrive. However, when the messenger gives Aang the message to give to Bato, Aang betrays his friends in a way Katara or Sokka could never imagine. However, when Zuko recruits a bounty hunter named June to track Aang down. His friendship is put to the test, as he must deal with the fact that he betrayed his friends while defending himself from yet another fight.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: When Aang and his friends go to a Fire Nation town so that Aang can witness some firebending, their plan soon goes awry when its discovered that he is the Avatar. Fortunately, hes rescued by an individual who serves a firebending master named Jeong Jeong who has abandoned the Fire Nation, so Aang attempts to use this time to attempt to learn how to firebend. However, when the firebending master refuses to even see Aang, will Aang be able to prove hes ready to learn how to firebend despite the fact that he lacks discipline?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Littlefoot: Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! Kowalski comes to the rescue with his invention the Persona-Disentangleizer, which separates her savage nature from her regular self. The savage Marlene escapes and rampages through the city. Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.sub-title: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper: Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. Private, Rico, and Kowalski battle their way to a fish packing plant where they discover Officer X has become Fishmonger X. The deranged X sniffs out the fighting penguins, capturing them and hauling them off to the pokey. Can they rediscover the teamwork they had forsaken in order to escape? High Moltage: The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie! Private, however, has an itchy problem - hes turned hideous because hes molting! The penguins need his hypercute powers to knock Alice out and disengage her new zoo security system. The despondent bird does all he can to reconstruct his cuteness, but sadly his hypercute powers distort to cause a hyperalarming, hypervomitous mess!

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.desc: Parem saab raakida oma raamatu mõtet kuulsale kirjanikule A. N. Teisele, aga ta on seltskonnas liigne. Parem ja Parim valvavad Diamondo kodu ning mõistavad, et selles on rohkemat kui massaažitoolid ja piiramatu hulk snakke.

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.sub-title: Üks parem paev 1. osa / Üks parem paev 2. osa
programme.desc: Paremlinn tahistab Paremat paeva, aga Parem ja Parim suudavad linnaelanikke vihastada, põhjustades jalle pahandusi. Parem ja Parim on linnast valja heidetud. Nad naasevad, lootes naabritega ja endavahel suhteid parandada.

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.desc: Parem ja Parim on naljakate kaksikute paar, kes elavad veidras ja lõbusas reaalsuses, kus su naabriks võib olla pahurad puksid või su parimaks sõbraks on peeru hõljuv pilv.

programme.title: Avastaja Dora
programme.desc: Dora competes against a team of monsters to win the Big Cup Soccer Tournament.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash against Dr. Minyak, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger and have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Selle asemel, et minna laevale, mis suvelaagrisse laheb, astuvad Kasna-Kalle ja Patrick kogemata laevale, mis on tais vanglasse suunduvaid vange. Kasna-Kalle ja Patrick hiilivad Sandy metsaseiklusele kaasa.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kalmer on nii vasinud, et Kasna-Kalle ja Patrick ei suuda teda ules aratada, aga nad ei lase tal suurt prooviesinemist maha magada. // Hr Krabi ja tema meeskond toitlustavad peent pidu, kuid rikaste klientide teenindamine võib ule jõu kaia.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.sub-title: Kas sa oled nuud õnnelik? / Meduuside planeet
programme.desc: Kalmer ei suuda meelde tuletada oma kõige toredamat malestust ja Kasna-Kalle "aitab" tal uue luua. // Kui kuri ulemvalitseja kõik Bikiini Põhja elanikud kloonidega asendab, peavad Kasna-Kalle ja Sandy ta alistama.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Plankton ajab kõik Hr Krabi kliendid minema ja Hr Krabi peab nende tagasi meelitamiseks jagama valja tasuta krabiburgereid. // Kasna-Kalle ananass laguneb ja tal laheb selle renoveerimiseks vaja kõikide sõprade abi.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kui Plankton oma arvutist naise Kareni uue ja parema Karen 2-ga asendab, hakkab esialgne Karen Krõbedas Krabis tootama. // Kasna-Kalle ei suuda magada ja palub abi Patrickult, kes ei suuda uleval olla.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle ja Patrick teevad panuse selle peale, kumb kauem "naljakat nagu" suudab hoida, kuid nende naod jaavadki selliseks. // Kasna-Kalle ja Patrick veedavad viimase toreda ja ohtliku paeva peagi suletavas Kindamaailmas.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kui Kalmer võltshaiguse tõttu koju laheb, arvab Kasna-Kalle Hupohondrikpuks, et haigus on talle pariselt kulge hakanud. // Pr Puff leiab Kasna-Kalle ohtlikule sõidustiilile otstarbe ja paneb ta kirja romurallile.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle toob koju karbitaie uusi teomaiustusi, mille nimel on Gary kõigeks valmis - eriti siis, kui need otsa saavad. // Plankton võidab tasuta krabiburgeri ja Hr Krabi teeb kõik, et ta seda katte ei saaks.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle valvab Sandy maja ja kõik on vaikne ja rahulik, kuni Patrick valja ilmub.

programme.title: Kivi, Paber, Kaarid
programme.desc: Kaarid aitab Paberil nadalavahetust piisavalt huvitavaks teha, et Pliiatsile muljet avaldada. Veel põnevam on see, et Kivi ostab mutsi Kivi, Paber ja Kaarid tõestavad, et nende uus sõber Putty ei peaks neid asendama.

programme.title: Nachrichten
programme.desc: ntv informiert uber die aktuellen Top-Themen des Tages, zeigt die wichtigsten Entwicklungen auf der ganzen Welt, liefert Hintergrunde und Einschatzungen und fasst zusammen, was die Menschen bewegt. Immer wieder sind Experten und Politiker im Studio oder zugeschaltet, die die Nachrichtenlage kommentieren und einordnen.

programme.title: Teleborse
programme.desc: Die "Teleborse" prasentiert die wichtigsten Wirtschafts- und Finanznachrichten des Tages, ordnet sie fur die Zuschauer ein und liefert Erklarungen. Zu Wort kommen dabei sowohl Verbraucher als auch relevante Experten - vom Startup-Up-Grunder bis zum Vorstandschef. Die aktuellsten Entwicklungen an den Finanzmarkten veranschaulichen Reporter an den Borsen in Frankfurt und New York.

programme.title: NFL Aktuell
programme.desc: Das ntv Magazin "NFL Aktuell" widmet sich jeden Dienstag um 19:10 Uhr und 23:20 Uhr den aktuellen Themen und Entwicklungen rund um die NFL. Das Magazin prasentiert die Highlights des vergangenen NFL-Wochenendes, inklusive des Monday-Night Games. Zudem liefern die Moderatoren Alessa-Luisa Naujoks und Marcel Klein alle Ergebnisse, Wissenswertes und Experten-Einschatzungen rund um den Spieltag und nehmen auch die kommende Gameweek ins Visier.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Stephen Seddon wird im Marz 2012 als Held gefeiert, weil er seine Eltern und seinen Neffen aus einem sinkenden Auto rettet, uber das er selbst die Kontrolle verloren hatte und das im Kanal landete. Vier Monate spater sind seine Eltern tot. Scheinbar ein erweiterter Selbstmord seines Vaters. Doch die Spurensicherung findet heraus: der Mann kann sich gar nicht selbst erschossen haben. Der geldgierige Sohn hat seine Eltern wegen des Erbes getotet.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Anthony Arkwright totete 1988 zunachst seinen GroSSvater und dessen Haushalterin, bevor er zwei seiner Nachbarn bestialisch ermordete. Auf den ersten stach Arkwright mehr als 500 Mal ein, bevor er dessen Eingeweide herausriss und in allen Raumen der Wohnung verteilte. Sein letztes Opfer war an den Rollstuhl gefesselt. Ihm stach er die Augen aus und stopfte Zigaretten in die leeren Hohlen.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Die Dokumentationsreihe "Furchte Deinen Nachsten!" wirft einen Blick auf die grausamen Taten von Schwerverbrechern, deren Freunde und Familie bis zur Aufklarung der Verbrechen ahnungslos waren. Vater, Eltern, Ehemanner und Geliebte haben sich fur die ihnen nahestehenden Menschen als Monster erwiesen, die ein Doppelleben fuhrten. Auf der einen Seite waren sie treusorgende Angehorige und auf der anderen Seite Rauber, Betruger und Killer...

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Fur Jenn Carson ist ihr Vater die wichtigste Bezugsperson in ihrem Leben. Er war es, der zu Hause blieb, als sie ein Baby war, weil ihre Mutter arbeitete. Doch alles andert sich fur die junge Frau, als sie erkennen muss, dass der Mensch, den sie am meisten liebt, ein Serienkiller ist.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Sante und ihr Sohn Kenneth Kimes lebten in einer Fantasiewelt, betrogen andere Menschen um ihr Geld und ihren Besitz. Dabei gingen sie uber Leichen, um ihr Treiben zu vertuschen. Sie toteten einen Bankangestellten, einen Freund der Familie und 1998 eine 82-jahrige Frau, deren Identitat Sante Kimes annehmen wollte, um deren Appartementhaus in Manhattan zu verkaufen.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Stephen Seddon wird im Marz 2012 als Held gefeiert, weil er seine Eltern und seinen Neffen aus einem sinkenden Auto rettet, uber das er selbst die Kontrolle verloren hatte und das im Kanal landete. Vier Monate spater sind seine Eltern tot. Scheinbar ein erweiterter Selbstmord seines Vaters. Doch die Spurensicherung findet heraus: der Mann kann sich gar nicht selbst erschossen haben. Der geldgierige Sohn hat seine Eltern wegen des Erbes getotet.

programme.title: ntv Faktenzeichen
programme.desc: Fakt oder Fake? Wie erkenne ich, ob Videos und Fotos echt sind? Moderatorin Julia Weber zeigt gemeinsam mit einem Verifizierungsteam, warum wir schnell auf tauschend echte Bilder reinfallen und wie es funktioniert, Fakes aufzudecken. Denn es braucht deutlich mehr als den gesunden Menschenverstand, um die Kunstliche Intelligenz zu entlarven und die Wahrheit zu beweisen.

programme.title: Nachrichten
programme.desc: ntv informiert uber die aktuellen Top-Themen des Tages, zeigt die wichtigsten Entwicklungen auf der ganzen Welt, liefert Hintergrunde und Einschatzungen und fasst zusammen, was die Menschen bewegt. Immer wieder sind Experten und Politiker im Studio oder zugeschaltet, die die Nachrichtenlage kommentieren und einordnen.

programme.title: Teleborse
programme.desc: Die "Teleborse" prasentiert die wichtigsten Wirtschafts- und Finanznachrichten des Tages, ordnet sie fur die Zuschauer ein und liefert Erklarungen. Zu Wort kommen dabei sowohl Verbraucher als auch relevante Experten - vom Startup-Up-Grunder bis zum Vorstandschef. Die aktuellsten Entwicklungen an den Finanzmarkten veranschaulichen Reporter an den Borsen in Frankfurt und New York.

programme.title: News Spezial
programme.desc: Ein groSSes Thema, das gerade in der ganzen Welt oder in ganz Deutschland fur Furore sorgt, wird in dieser Sendung besonders ausfuhrlich behandelt. Auf der Grundlage genauer und grundlicher Recherchen wird das jeweilige Thema ausfuhrlich dargestellt und die Problematik bis ins Detail erlautert. Interviews und Diskussionen mit Experten runden das Informationsprogramm ab.

programme.title: ntv Service
programme.desc: Die aktuellen politischen und wirtschaftlichen Entwicklungen zeigen, wie sehr wir als Konsumenten von ihren Folgen betroffen sind. Verbrauchersendungen sortieren die relevanten Informationen und bereiten sie fur die Zuschauer verstandlich und zuverlassig auf. ntv baut mit dem neuen Service-Magazin seine jahrelange Kompetenz bei Ratgeber-Themen weiter aus und besetzt gleichzeitig auch neue Themenfelder, die in Zukunft immer wichtiger werden.

programme.title: 3 Manner vom Bau
programme.desc: Drei junge Familienvater wollten sich etwas aufbauen und das tun, was ihnen am meisten SpaSS macht. Die Bruder Thomas und Eduard Wittenberg sowie ihr Freund Mike Schopp grundeten eine Firma, die sich auf Problem-Immobilien spezialisiert hat. Ihr neuestes Objekt: Ein Sechsfamilienhaus, dessen Erdgeschosswohnung sie - uberwiegend in Eigenleistung komplett entkernen und sanieren. Die Dokumentation begleitet sie dabei.

programme.title: 3 Manner vom Bau
programme.desc: Innerhalb von nur funf Jahren haben es die Bruder Thomas und Eduard Wittenberg sowie ihr Freund Mike Schopp zu 25 Hausern mit mehr als 100 Wohnungen gebracht. Um die Mietpreise erschwinglich zu halten, stecken die Immobilienunternehmer viel Eigenleistung in ihr neuestes Objekt, ein Sechsfamilienhaus. Nachdem sie hier das Wohnzimmer saniert haben, ist nun der Flur an der Reihe. Die Dokumentation schaut ihnen bei der Sanierung uber die Schulter.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: In Kasachstan wird ein bizarrer Industriekomplex in einer abgelegenen Wuste untersucht. Nachdem die Entdecker die Sicherheitsvorkehrungen und die Sprengfallen umgangen haben, stoSSen sie auf einen Hangar. Satelliten fangen die unglaubliche Szene von Geisterschiffen ein, die aus dem Meer auf den Strand einer japanischen Insel auftauchen. Wissenschaftler entdecken durch Luftaufnahmen, dass weite Teile der nordamerikanischen Walder sterben.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Die Historikerin Alex Richie reist nach Polen, um die Geschichte hinter den bizarren Markierungen zu entschlusseln, die mit Hilfe von LIDAR in einem dichten Waldgebiet entdeckt wurden. Sie findet heraus, dass es sich um Überreste einer Ausbildungsstatte fur einige der beruchtigtsten Nazigruppen des Zweiten Weltkriegs handelt. Satelliten uber Nordkalifornien entdecken uber hundert seltsame, geometrische Strukturen in einem abgelegenen Sumpfgebiet.

programme.title: Hidden Planet
programme.desc: Vor Millionen von Jahren war der groSSte Teil Australiens mit Regenwald bedeckt; ein Land, in dem Dinosaurier umherstreiften und Seeungeheuer in Binnenmeeren kreuzten. Der Asteroideneinschlag, der die Dinosaurier ausloschte, war der Ausgangspunkt fur dramatische Veranderungen. Saugetiere eroberten die Erde, als sie sich allmahlich abkuhlte und austrocknete - und Australien erlebte die Entstehung einer einzigartigen und auSSergewohnlichen Tierwelt.

programme.title: Hidden Planet
programme.desc: Das Beringmeer liegt zwischen Alaska und Russland und verbirgt die Überreste einer verlorenen Welt. Wahrend der letzten Kaltzeit, als die Ozeane um mehr als 100 Meter zuruckgingen, wurde die Landbrucke, die als Beringia bekannt ist, freigelegt. Sie war eisfrei und bot Tieren aus dem Osten und dem Westen einen Zufluchtsort. Diese Landbrucke ermoglichte die Vermischung von Tieren, die wir heute als asiatisch, europaisch und amerikanisch bezeichnen.

programme.title: What on Earth?
